price: Ɛyε abufusεm kεse wͻ Nyankopͻn anim sε mobεka asεm na monyε.
arabic: كَبُرَ مَقۡتًا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ أَن تَقُولُواْ مَا لَا تَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: kabura maqtan ʿinda al-lahi an taqūlū mā lā tafʿalūna
